tit.cmt: 山の表現を統一しました。

sen.j: 五老岳（ごろうがだけ）は、京都府舞鶴市の中央部、東舞鶴と西舞鶴を分ける山岳。
sen.e: Gorogadake Mountain is a mountain that is located in the center of Maizuru City Kyoto Prefecture and divides Higashi-Maizuru and Nishi-Maizuru.
Gorogadake Mountain is a mountain that is located in the center of Maizuru City Kyoto Prefecture and divides Higashi-Maizuru and Nishi-Maizuru.
Mt. Gorogadake is a mountain that is located in the center of Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture and divides Higashi-Maizuru and Nishi-Maizuru.
It is 310 meters high.
It is 310 meters high.
It is 301 meters high.

sen.j: 山頂から見える、複雑に入り組んだリアス式海岸と、日本海に浮かぶ緑の島々が広がる景色豊かな山である。
sen.e: Its summit commands an extensive view of the complicated coastline of a ria coast and green islands in Japan Sea.
Its summit commands an extensive view of the complicated coastline of a ria coast and green islands in Japan Sea.
Its summit commands an extensive view of the complicated coastline of a ria coast and green islands in Japan Sea.

sen.j: また、五老岳にそびえる高さ50mの展望タワーである五老スカイタワーの展望台からは、「近畿百景第1位」に選ばれた舞鶴湾、舞鶴市内の景観を360度のパノラマで満喫することができ、大正13年に国の天然記念物に指定された、オオミズナギドリ最後の楽園と言われている冠島の島影も見ることができる。
sen.e: From the platform of Goro Sky Tower, a 50-meter high observatory tower, you can also enjoy a 360-degree panoramic view of Maizuru bay and Maizuru City, which ranked first of "the best 100 views in Kinki Region," and see the faint outlines of Kammuri-jima Island. which is said to be the last paradise for streaked shearwaters designated as natural monument in 1924.

From the platform of Goro Sky Tower, a 50-meter high observatory tower, you can also enjoy a 360-degree panoramic view of Maizuru bay and Maizuru City, which ranked first of "the best 100 views in Kinki Region," and see the faint outlines of Kammuri-jima Island. which is said to be the last paradise for streaked shearwaters designated as natural monument in 1924.

From the platform of Goro Sky Tower, a fifty-meter high observatory tower, you can also enjoy a 360-degree panoramic view of Maizuru bay and Maizuru City, which ranked first of "the best 100 views in Kinki Region," and see the faint outlines of Kanmuri-jima Island, which is said to be the last paradise for streaked shearwaters designated as natural monument in 1924.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 初日の出を見る好スポットでもある。
sen.e: It is one of the best place to go to see the first sunrise of the year.
It is one of the best place to go to see the first sunrise of the year.
It is one of the best places to go to see the first sunrise of the year.
From Nishi-Maizuru
From Nishi-Maizuru
From Nishi-Maizuru

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道 西舞鶴駅から京都交通 (舞鶴)・東舞鶴行きバスで「五老岳公園口」下車し、徒歩で約45分
sen.e: 45 minutes walk from the bus stop "Gorogadake Koen-guchi" of Kyoto Kotsu bus (Maizuru) bound from Nishii-Maizuru Station to Higashi-Maizuru.
45 minutes walk from the bus stop "Gorogadake Koen-guchi" of Kyoto Kotsu bus (Maizuru) bound from Nishii-Maizuru Station to Higashi-Maizuru.
Forty-five minutes walk from the bus stop 'Gorogadake Koen-guchi' of Kyoto Kotsu bus (Maizuru) bound from Nishii-Maizuru Station to Higashi-Maizuru.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: JR西舞鶴駅からタクシーで約15分
sen.e: 15 minutes by taxi from JR Nishimaizuru Station
15 minutes by taxi from JR Nishimaizuru Station
Fifteen minutes by taxi from JR Nishimaizuru Station
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.e: From Higashi-Maizuru
From Higashi-Maizuru
From Higashi-Maizuru

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道 東舞鶴駅から京都交通 (舞鶴)・西舞鶴行きバスで「五老岳公園口」下車し、徒歩で約45分
sen.e: 45 minutes walk from the bus stop "Gorogadake Koen-guchi" of Kyoto Kotsu bus (Maizuru) bound from Higashi-Maizuru Station to Nishi-Maizuru.
45 minutes walk from the bus stop "Gorogadake Koen-guchi" of Kyoto Kotsu bus (Maizuru) bound from Higashi-Maizuru Station to Nishi-Maizuru.
Forty-five minutes walk from the bus stop 'Gorogadake Koen-guchi' of Kyoto Kotsu bus (Maizuru) bound from Higashi-Maizuru Station to Nishi-Maizuru.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 舞鶴観光周遊バスで山頂まで最短で22分（土日祝のみ）
sen.e: The shortest way to the summit is to take a Maizuru Sightseeing Excursion Bus (only on weekends and National holidays)
The shortest way to the summit is to take a Maizuru Sightseeing Excursion Bus (only on weekends and National holidays)
The shortest way to the summit is to take a Maizuru Sightseeing Excursion Bus (only on weekends and national holidays), which takes twenty-two minutes.

sen.j: JR西舞鶴駅からタクシーで約25分
sen.e: 15 minutes by taxi from JR Higashimaizuru Station
sen.cmt: 東舞鶴の間違では？と思い東舞鶴で訳してあります。
sen.e: 15 minutes by taxi from JR Higashimaizuru Station
Twenty-five minutes by taxi from JR Higashimaizuru Station
sen.cmt: 数字を修正しました。和文原文では「西舞鶴」とありますが、正しくは「東舞鶴」だと思われます。
